extends java.lang.Object
    This class facilitates downloading of widevine offline content and thumbnails associated with media and channels.

      • startDownload

        public void startDownload(java.lang.String url,
                 java.lang.String mimetype,
                 java.lang.String saveDirLocation,
                 Downloader.DownLoadCallback callback)
        This method downloads the content. Content may be widevine offline content or thumbnail associated with channel or media. It has an inner async task class which downloads content asynchronously.
